attributes.action: treat all British Legion Poppy Appeal proceeds 2008 as qualifying for Gift Aid.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: British Legion is uniquely placed to make the best use of whatever sum may be involved - it has contacts with all ex-service personnel in need (and to whom we all owe our freedom). It is a charity which is colourless, classless, and embraces all religions and none, and its uniqueness should prevent cries of "foul" or "favouritism" from any other charity.
